00023 class PluginManager
00024 {

00026         typedef void (*initiate)(const string &);

00038 #ifdef WIN32
00039         template <class T>
00040         void load_module(const ModuleType module_type, string &path, const string &parameters, const char *import, T &function)
00041         {
00042                 path = "./modules/" + path;
00043                 HMODULE module (LoadLibraryA(path.c_str()));
00044                 if (module != NULL)
00045                 {
00046                         ((initiate)GetProcAddress(module, "initiate"))(parameters);
00047                         function = (T)GetProcAddress(module, import);
00048                         switch (module_type)
00049                         {
00050                                 case mating_module:
00051                                         this->offspring_rate = ((offspring_produced)GetProcAddress(module, "offspring"))();
00052                                         break;
00053                                 case gene_module:
00054                                         this->genotype_to_str = (GenotypeToStr)GetProcAddress(module, "str");
00055                                         this->modules[module_type] = ((module_name)GetProcAddress(module, "species"))();
00056                                         break;
00057                                 default:
00058                                         this->modules[module_type] = ((module_name)GetProcAddress(module, "name"))();
00059                                         break;
00060                         }
00061                 }
00062         }
00063 #else
00064         template <class T>
00065         void load_module(const ModuleType module_type, string &path, const string &parameters, const char *import, T &function)
00066         {
00067                 path = "./modules/" + path;
00068                 void *module = dlopen(path.c_str(), RTLD_LAZY);
00069                 if (module != NULL)
00070                 {
00071                         ((initiate)dlsym(module, "initiate"))(parameters);
00072                         function = (T)dlsym(module, import);
00073                         switch (module_type)
00074                         {
00075                                 case gene_module:
00076                                         this->genotype_to_str = (GenotypeToStr)dlsym(module, "str");
00077                                         this->modules[module_type] = ((module_name)dlsym(module, "species"))();
00078                                         break;
00079                                 case mating_module:
00080                                         this->offspring_rate = ((offspring_produced)dlsym(module, "offspring"))();
00081                                 default:
00082                                         this->modules[module_type] = ((module_name)dlsym(module, "name"))();
00083                                         break;
00084                         }
00085                 }
00086         }
00087 #endif
